creator: The ironman
title: knex iron man project
description: This project aims to create a full-sized wearable Iron Man suit made from Knex, with builders contributing designs for helmets, arms, legs, and other parts. The goal is to create a collaborative online build where anyone can construct their own Iron Man suit using the provided instructable.
steps: Builders design and create individual components of the Iron Man suit using Knex, such as the helmet, arms, legs, etc.
Designs are submitted to the online community for consideration.
Selected designs will be compiled into a comprehensive instructable.
Builders can then use the instructable to build their own wearable Iron Man suit from Knex.
Completed suits can be shared online.
